Voyager

Superyacht

Voyager SUPERYACHT completely rethinks everything about the way you buy your navigational services.

It provides new levels of simplicity, transparency and safety.

It builds on the incredible ease, security and functionality that thousands of vessels love about our Voyager software.

And, it's the first navigation service that actually encourages you to spend less on charts.

Whether you navigate with paper charts, digital charts or both, with Voyager SUPERYACHT you can do things that no other navigation service lets you do.

Which one's right for you?

Every aspect of Voyager SUPERYACHT is designed to make navigation easier.

Management

The best way to manage your fleet

Track every yacht from one location, manage navigation compliance online, improve budgeting with sailing statistics and reduce your overall costs.

  • Discover more

Charterers

The ultimate user experience

Give your customers the very best sailing experience while keeping track of your yachts wherever they are in the world.

  • Discover more

Private ownesrs

The easiest way to get where you're going

Sail safely with a pristine set of freshly printed charts at the start of each sailing season as well as the very best digital navigation software and charts.

  • Discover more
